attributes.action: People who are self isolating from corona,too not have their attendance damaged
attributes.additional_details: Because to be fair it’s the government’s fault for not closing done schools and colleges in the first place . Boris has stated that mass gatherings are band even though school/college is literally a mass gathering
attributes.background: People in my college are self isolating to prevent the spread of this virus. however their attendance is going down and this will affect the end of year over all report

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced the closure of schools and colleges.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
